articles.title: Anna Wintour steps down as Vogue editor-in-chief, but will retain control of storied magazine - CNN
articles.description: After nearly four decades as the editor-in-chief of American Vogue, Anna Wintour is stepping down, but will still oversee Vogue’s global editorial direction.
articles.content:
After nearly four decades as the editor-in-chief of American Vogue, Anna Wintour is stepping down and seeking a replacement.
